messages.content:
Continue this story:

"Did I ever tell you about the time I got catfished?" asked Doug. "Yes, Doug, we've all heard the story...*ugh*" sighed his unwitting (and reluctant) accomplice Fred, "Let's just focus on the job."

"Sorry, I just can't help it - the catfish story is just so *silly*!" exclaimed Fred, shaking his head. "Anyway, let's talk about the *project*!" insisted Doug, with a twinkle in his eye. "What's the latest?"

"Doug, can we please just stick to the topic at hand? I'm trying to focus on the *project*!" protested Fred. "Sorry, I'm just a bit distracted...*ugh*...I keep thinking about that time I got catfished!"
